statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_records;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_records GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE customer_id = 123 AND amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_records WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_records GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_records GROUP BY status HAVING transaction_count > 10 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT id, description FROM transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, description, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT description, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 5000
SELECT timestamp, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN accounts ON transactions.amount = accounts.balance ORDER BY transactions.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions_history WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT account_id, customer_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT th.transaction_id, th.timestamp, c.name FROM transactions_history th JOIN customers c ON th.account_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, a.balance FROM transactions t JOIN accounts a ON t.transaction_id = a.account_id ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory
